entry.content: In this article, we explore how to get started with the prediction of cryptocurrency prices using multiple linear regression. The factors investigated include predictions on various time intervals as well as the use of various features in the models such as opening price, high price, low price and volume.

entry.content: My day can vary, it really depends on which phase of the project I'm on. Let‚Äôs say we want to add a feature to our product ‚Äì my tasks could range from designing solutions and working with the team to find the best one, to deploying new features into production and doing maintenance. Along the way, I‚Äôll communicate changes to our stakeholders, write docs, code and test solutions, build analytics dashboards, clean-up old code, and fix bugs.

entry.content: Posted by Pasin Manurangsi and Chiyuan Zhang, Research Scientists, Google Research Over the last several years, there has been an increased focus on developing differential privacy (DP) machine learning (ML) algorithms. DP has been the basis of several practical deployments in industry ‚Äî and has even been employed by the U.S. Census ‚Äî because it enables the understanding of system and algorithm privacy guarantees. The underlying assumption of DP is that changing a single user‚Äôs contribution to a...

entry.title: Building a culture of pioneering responsibly | DeepMind Blog
entry.summary: When I joined DeepMind as COO, I did so in large part because I could tell that the founders and team had the same focus on positive social impact. In fact, at DeepMind, we now champion a term that pe...
entry.content: When I joined DeepMind as COO, I did so in large part because I could tell that the founders and team had the same focus on positive social impact. In fact, at DeepMind, we now champion a term that perfectly captures my own values and hopes for integrating technology into people‚Äôs daily lives: pioneering responsibly. I believe pioneering responsibly should be a priority for anyone working in tech. But I also recognise that it‚Äôs especially important when it comes to powerful, widespread technolog...

entry.summary: In October 2021, we announced that we acquired the MuJoCo physics simulator, and made it freely available for everyone to support research everywhere. We also committed to developing and maintaining M...
entry.content: In October 2021, we announced that we acquired the MuJoCo physics simulator, and made it freely available for everyone to support research everywhere. We also committed to developing and maintaining MuJoCo as a free, open-source, community-driven project with best-in-class capabilities. Today, we‚Äôre thrilled to report that open sourcing is complete and the entire codebase is on GitHub! Here, we explain why MuJoCo is a great platform for open-source collaboration and share a preview of our roadma...

entry.content: If you want to be at DeepMind, go for it. Apply, interview, and just try. You might not get it the first time but that doesn‚Äôt mean you can‚Äôt try again. I never thought DeepMind would accept me, and when they did, I thought it was a mistake. Everyone doubts themselves ‚Äì I‚Äôve never felt like the smartest person in the room. I‚Äôve often felt the opposite. But I‚Äôve learned that, despite those feelings, I do belong and I do deserve to work at a place like this. And that journey, for me, started with ...
